implementationnogui

Class ImplementationNoGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • implementationnogui.ImplementationNoGUI

  • public class ImplementationNoGUI
extends java.lang.Object
    The application test class which runs all the main methods and menus for the application.

      static void addItemToCart(java.util.ArrayList<Item> items, Cart userCart, boolean auto)
      takes the users cart, a list of items to allow user to input a item id for the desired item and then it puts it in the cart, if they already have an item of the same type it increases the quantity of that item instead SRS 3.1.1.2, 3.1.4.3
      static void addMoneyToUser(User us1, boolean auto)
      allows the user to add more funds to their account SRS 3.1.3.8
      static void changeItemQuantity(Cart userCart, boolean auto)
      allows the user to change the amount of an item in their cart and removes it if they specify 0 as the amount SRS 3.1.1.10

      changes user info depending on choice from menu such as address, password or email
      static void connect()
      establishes the connection to the sql database

      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      main method of the application makes an array of items for the store connects to the database adds the user to the database if not already in it then displays the main menu and does corresponding user choice SRS 3.1.3.2, 3.1.3.5,
